text: Maria Carolina of Austria (13 May 1717 â€“ 29 November 1780) was the Queen of Naples and Sicily through her marriage to Ferdinand I of the Two Sicilies. She was the daughter of Emperor Francis I and Maria Theresa of Austria. ==Life== Maria Carolina was born in Vienna. She had two sisters with the same name, but both of them died as babies. She was close friends with her sister Marie Antoinette. She married Ferdinand I of the Two Sicilies in 1768. ==References== Category:1717 births Category:1780 deaths Category:Habsburg Dynasty Category:Kings and Queens consort
title: Maria Carolina of Austria
